Gain 1 (2) Strength,

1 (2) Plated Armor.

Heal 5 (7) HP. Add a Slimed into your hand.

Apply 3 (4) Plated Armor.
Apply 3 Constricted 3 (4) times.

cards.name: Expiration Date

Deal 4 (6) damage.

Deal 12 (16) damage to ALL enemies.

Innate.

(Innate.)

Whenever a Status
card is Exhausted,
draw 2 cards.

Innate.
Gain 1 (2)  [E].

X (+1) times.

Whenever a Status
card is Exhausted,
gain 1 (2) Strength.

Reclaim 1 card.

cards.name: Shrapnel
cards.description: Whenever you Peel, deal 4 (6) damage to a random enemy.

Exhaust.

Choose 1 of 3 skills of any color to add into your hand. It costs 0 until played.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.description:
Apply 4 (6) Constricted.
ALL enemies take damage equal to their Constricted.

Apply 4 Constricted to ALL enemies X (+1) Times.
Exhaust.

Receive 10 (12) damage.
If you would die, raise your Max HP by 9 (12).
Exhaust.

Deal 26 (34) damage to
ALL enemies.
Gain 2 Vulnerable.

Shuffle a (2) copy (copies) of the last card played this combat into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

Obtain an Essence of Steel.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ensnare

cards.name: Extractor

cards.name: Flash Freeze
cards.description:
Gain 10 (14) Block.
Block is not removed at the start of your next 2 turns.

Gain 1 Plated Armor.
If Fatal, permanently increase this gain by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Goorruption
cards.description:
Status cards cost 0 and can be played.

cards.name: Overripe
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) Strength.
At the start of your turn, lose 1 Strength.

cards.name: Parasitic Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Whenever you lose HP, gain 3 Block and increase this gain by 1.

cards.name: Plated Farmer
cards.description:
Peel ALL:

cards.name: RAT

cards.name: Savagery

Peel 2 (1), Gain [E] ,
and draw 1 card for each 2 Plated Armor you have.
Exhaust.

Heal 7 (10) HP.

for 2 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Suction
cards.description:
Deal 26 (32) damage.
Suck 5 (7) HP.

cards.name: Toxoplasmosis
cards.description: If the enemy intends to attack, deal its single-hit damage to ALL enemies at the start of its turn.

relics.name: Carapace
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Plated Armor.

relics.name: Green Skull
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 4 additional Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: A small skull collected from fallen ascenders.

relics.name: Non-Newtonian Flesh
relics.description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, gain Block equal to half your Plated Armor at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: "Most curious! It appears to gain enormous viscosity upon being struck!" - Ranwid

relics.name: Pit of Fury
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain 2 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: This seed is just so angry.

relics.name: Preserved Parasite
relics.description: Enemies in non-elite and non-boss encounters have 20% less HP
relics.flavorText: The parasite seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly normal enemies.

relics.name: Start Codon
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 additional [E] for each Innate card in your deck
relics.flavorText: This piece of genetic information tells the avocado to just 'go'.

relics.name: Suck Dummy
relics.description: Whenever you heal HP during combat, heal 2 additional HP

relics.name: Tungsten Plate
relics.description: Reduce all Plated Armor losses due to Peel by 1.

relics.name: Mark of Nausea
relics.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 3 Slimeds into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This brand is used to signify parasites who have mastered nausea.

relics.name: Sturdy Carapace
relics.description: Replaces Carapace. Start each combat with 2 Plated Armor. The first time you Peel each turn, gain 2 Metallicize.

relics.name: Twisted Tendril
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Constricted to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It stretches and twists interminably, searching for anything to grab on to.

keywords.name: Constricted
keywords.description: Constricted enemies take damage equal to their Constricted at the end of their turn.

keywords.name: Keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

keywords.name: Peel
keywords.description: Lose Plated Armor to activate effect. You cannot peel if you do not have enough Plated Armor.

keywords.name: React
keywords.description: Activate effect if the enemy intends to do a certain action.

keywords.name: Reclaim
keywords.description: Adds a copy of a random card from your discard pile into your hand.

keywords.name: Suck
keywords.description: Heal X HP and reduce this healing by 1 this combat.
